doc.headline: Urgent: Bush says shooting marks "day of sadness" for nation

text.p: U.S. President George W. Bush said at the memorial service held at Virginia Tech Tuesday that the shooting rampage marked "a day of sadness" for the entire nation.

"This is a day of mourning for the Virginia Tech community and it is a day of sadness for our entire nation," Bush said at the memorial service held at Blacksburg, Virginia where the university is located.
